Activity: Arrive at the office. Check emails and calendar for urgent matters. Prioritize tasks based on urgency and impact.
Review the weekly progress report and identify areas for improvement in the project management process.
Analyze the key risks and issues identified during the week. Develop contingency plans to address these risks and issues.
Meet with @CIO-1 to discuss long-term strategic goals and explore new investment opportunities for the fund.
Collaborate with @larch-1 and @sdev-1, @sdev-2 on the software architecture and development roadmap. Ensure the system is scalable, secure, and reliable.
Conduct a lessons learned session with the team to identify best practices and areas for improvement in the project management process.
Lunch. Celebrate team accomplishments with a team lunch.
Prepare a summary of key accomplishments and challenges for the week. Share this summary with the team and stakeholders.
Plan activities and goals for the following week based on the progress and challenges from the current week.
Update the project plan with the latest progress and planned activities for the next week.
Review the budget and expenses for the project. Identify any potential cost overruns and develop strategies to control costs.
Meet with the team to discuss upcoming activities and ensure everyone is aligned on the project goals and timelines.
Finalize daily tasks and prepare for the weekend.
